fields.summary: Story: entering and leaving maintenance mode

issuetype.description: A user story. Created by JIRA Software - do not edit or delete.
issuetype.name: Story

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Task: CC to pass node state back to CLC

comments.body:
A series of enable/disable requests to two NCs via {{CCclient}} a la

{code}
# ./cluster/CCclient_full localhost:8774 modifyNode 192.168.51.192 disabled
# ./cluster/CCclient_full localhost:8774 modifyNode 192.168.51.192 enabled
# ./cluster/CCclient_full localhost:8774 modifyNode 192.168.51.186 disabled
# ./cluster/CCclient_full localhost:8774 modifyNode 192.168.51.186 enabled
...
{code}

resulted in a following snippet in {{cc.log}}:

{code}
# egrep '(resources summary|received data|modifying)' /opt/eucalyptus/var/log/eucalyptus/cc.log | less
